website_summaries.verdict: The iconic savory stick-shaped dog treat will go easy on your dog’s teeth, and is certain to hold any puppy’s attention after their first taste.
pros: A meaty classic that is easily shredded into pieces

customer_reviews.title: My dog had a really bad diarrhea with a blood after eating these treats
customer_reviews.text: This product is dangerous for the dogs. My dog had a really bad diarrhea with a blood after eating these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Andzia

customer_reviews.title: Stale with expiration dates in 2019
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two packages of these on 12/14 and just got around to opening them. Both bags are stale - the sticks are hard when they should be soft. Both bags have an expiration of January 2019 and neither seem to have holes in them so no air has leaked in. Not sure why they are stale and it's too much of a pain in the butt to send them back. I think I'll switch to chewy and see if I can get better bags there.
customer_reviews.author: cjheim

customer_reviews.title: perfect, healthy
customer_reviews.text: Huge "go to" for my dogs. It's their morning wake up treat. And they expect it. Can't tell you if it's the absolute, perfect, healthy, vetted, organic treat. But I know they love them, so I love this product. I have a 10 year old French bulldog and she still looks like a young adult, so they mustn't be too "dangerous".
customer_reviews.author: Tubadoc

customer_reviews.title: Great price....better than Walmart
customer_reviews.text: If you buy them at the right moment otherwise they are the same as Walmart. My three Chihuahuas love them. I read the Red Dye #3 (or whichever) isn’t so great for dogs, so I break up in 1” pieces and they get two or three per day. Did I say how much my dogs love these?? So they have to be somewhat junky. Right? But other brands don’t get eaten so I buy these when amazon has them super cheap. Arrive fresh and fast. Large bag, different flavors.
customer_reviews.author: WyogalTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: STALE TREATS! Hard as a rock!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed as if it had been sitting on a warehouse shelf for 13 years. The treats were hard, stale, very little scent, and hard to break apart. I have purchased these exact treats from the local grocery store numerous times and I know how they should look/feel/smell. Very disappointed in Amazon for not monitoring their inventory quality and the number of days in inventory for this product. Do not buy these treats! Purchase from local store.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: My dog won't tell me ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog won't tell me what she thinks of the flavor, bur she certainly does devour them with a relish. I purchase the biggest bags but discover that near the end ... even though I make certain to reseal the bags tightly ... they do seem to dry out and harden towards the end. Recently I discovered that if I open a new bag and transfer them to a Zip-Loc freezer bag and place them in the freezer, the problem is solved and she simply LOVES a frozen treat on a hot summers day!
customer_reviews.author: Wet Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed in the freshness
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in the freshness. Very dry not sure how long this bag has been sitting around. The pieces of Pupperoni were very small not big and fresh that I'm use to receiving from Walmart. Not sure what I'm going to do with the dash button I bought. I've bought a lot through Amazon this has been the worst. Bottom line don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Big bag at a small price, worth the add-in price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s the big bag, usually 12-15 bucks. Items are soft fresh and the kids love them. I get dog food sent every 2 months and this qualified for Add-On prices. My kids are addicted to these. It’s a fun treat game with these.
customer_reviews.author: M.H. GG626 (JL)

customer_reviews.title: Mute dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My pup absolutely loves them.she now thinks she should get a treat everytime she goes outside. Od course its 20 to 30 below wind chills so shes kinda right. For these she actually does her trick first sits pretty then stands on her back legs before I actually ask her. That's a big first. When I told her gimme a min and I'll get ya a treat, then forgot she actually came into the room and barked at me and I mean loud barked at me to get my attention and remind me that she was owed a treat..... Now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Tony T

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these treats.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these things. In fact, one of my dogs wakes me up every morning so that I will give him his morning treat. The sticks are very easy to break into small pieces so that you can use them as "training treats". Over the years, I have tried various treats for my dogs. Some they liked....some they didn't like. They like these.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Old and Dried out!!
customer_reviews.text: i NORMALLY BUY pUP pERONI "tRIPLE sTEAK fLAVORED TREATS FROM A LOCAL PET SHOP OR FROM wALMART. mAINLY BECAUSE THEY ARE ALWAYS TENDER AND OUR TWO DOGS REALLY LOVE THE TASTE. bUT THE TWO PACKAGES i BOUGHT THROUGH aMAZON WERE SOMEWHAT DRIED OUT AND STIFF AND WHILe OUR DOGS WOULD STILL EAT THEM THEY CERTAINLY did not SHOW THE NORMAL ENTHUSIASM FOR THESE ITEMS. hOW THE TREAT STICKS COULD LOSE MOISTURE CONTENT HAS TO DO WITH HOW WELL THE "SEALED" PACKAGES ARE SEALED. oBVIOUSLY THESE TWO PACKS WERE NOT HANDLED WELL AND PROBABLY WERE QUITE OLD.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha1

customer_reviews.title: Bella says THEY'RE YYYYYYYYYYYYUUUUUUUUUMMMMMMMMMYYYYYYYYYYYYY!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think I created a monster because it's that time and she's ready for her treat....I taught her to tell me ...so now she sets next to me every evening and asks for her Pup Peroni treat....But of course she has to earn them so she spins on her hind legs and tells me she loves me....Everybody cracks up because it does sound like she is saying I love you....I have the Pup Peronis being delivered once a month so we don't run out...I have to break a few pieces up into her food so she'll eat it... Bella says....Thank U Pup Peroni and Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Heflin

customer_reviews.title: My Doxies Love These!
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of more expensive and healthier treats out there but my pups don't care. They love their pup-peronis. I break them up into smaller pieces for little mouths. Every time I open the bag I want to dash to the convenience store for a Slim Jim. These are clearly the junk food of dog treats, but a little doesn't hurt and it makes my pups very happy. I tried other snacks and my little girl, Patty just spits them out and looks for her pup-peroni. Oh well, everything in moderation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog as an enticement to walk by my side. So far she seems to enjoy the taste of them and gets very excited. I normally don't buy treats like this but I needed something delicious and smelly. These definitely work for that purpose. The smell is not super strong and smells like a mild jerky. Overall I'd say it's a huge bag and it's very worth the price. These essentially are junk food treats but they work for training I would just be cautious with how much you give.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Be aware it’s a cheap recipe snack
customer_reviews.text: I started giving my dog these treats because, of course, she likes eating practically every treat. But once this treat started being incorporated into her diet, there started to be blood in her stool. I was advised by my vet to immediately get her off of the treat, because it was the only changing factor in her life. Sure enough, after discontinuing the treat, no more blood. The vet did exams and everything came back negative. The vet said it was most likely the ingredients in the stick that really messed up her digestion tract.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Got Sick-diarrhea & vomiting
customer_reviews.text: We never had this issue before with these snacks but ALL 4 of my large dogs got extremely sick from eating these!! G.I issues -severe diarrhea followed by vomiting
customer_reviews.author: jmn27

customer_reviews.title: Great price delievered in an hour!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I would have bought a lot more but the limited me, LOL. My dog loves these and the price was cheaper than any store and delivered to my door in less than an hour. That was amazing. I gave a bag to my co-worker for her dog and she is thrilled with them as much as I am. Our dogs have pancreatitis and need a low fat diet and these are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Holly H.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs FAVORITE treat
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog who is missing most of his teeth on one side of his mouth and this is one of the only treats he can eat and truly enjoys. He loves his pupperoni's and I like this big bag (the actual treats are larger, but I just tear them in a half and only give one half at a time to my small chihuahua. So they last even longer! There are a regular monthly purchase in my household! And my other dog loves them too! Picture are my 2 dogs begging for Pupperonis!
customer_reviews.author: M.Cline

customer_reviews.title: Great training treat when cut to smaller size
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd loves these treats. I break them into smaller pieces and use them to train her to do tricks. She is a very smart girls and when using these in training she learns a trick in minutes. Now if someone could train me in tricks to teach her. A well grilled steak would work to train me.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Wiser

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I cut them in small pieces for him, and he LOVES them! We have tried various flavors and he enjoys them all. They are good for learning tricks, such as posing for the camera. As you can see in the photo, if you hold one up, he'll pose like a good boy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, big size! See update
customer_reviews.text: This came faster then expected. My doggies love this treat! The size of the bag is huge! Great deal, will def Buy again from this seller! Oh and very fresh! Update: A couple of days after we got these and gave some to our furbabys they both started having diarrhea/ soft stools. They went a lot too. Nothing else had changed but giving these to them so we stopped. Everything’s back to normal. It’s a shame cuz they loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for your pup.
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie loves these, this package came nice and sealed. It was fresh out of the plastic bag. It has a reseal option on the bag itself. I usually break it into 2 bc probably not healthy in large quantities. Hope my review helped.
customer_reviews.author: Joon yi

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY DOG
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dog that is a Yorkshire Terrier and this is the dog treat he loves. I have tried many dog treats but Peanut the Yorkie will eat only these. The treats are not real hard so they're easily consumed by my dog. You can give a whole treat to your dog or a partial treat , depending on the dog's size. The bag they come in is resealable so you can keep the treats from becoming stale. These treats come in different flavors and my dog loves them all.
customer_reviews.author: Derbert D. Mooney Jr.

customer_reviews.title: MY DOG LOVES THEM
customer_reviews.text: My doggie loves these. It's hard to find treats that he will/can eat. He is 15yrs, wieghs 6.5lbs with alot of missing teeth. When we give him pieces, he doesn't waste any time eating it. Happy to have found something my dog enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: Bandit01

customer_reviews.title: Great Product to Hide Pills In!
customer_reviews.text: Luckily for me, my dogs love these and the price is good. I need something to sneak pills in. These are the right size and as they are generally fresh when they arrive it is easy to use them for this. I just cut the into short pieces and then cut the open iengthwise about halfway through, stick the pill in, close it up and I swear my dog has no clue. No more bitten hands, or "cheeked" pills :)
customer_reviews.author: Frenchiesu

customer_reviews.title: The two-pack is old!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the two pack of Pupperoni, 25 oz each, and the "use by" date was Feb 1, 2017. More than two years out of date! They were very dark in color, and only smelled faintly of the usual smoky beef scent. Amazon said they'd refund the full purchase price, which is good, because those Pupperonis went in the trash. This was probably an anomaly based on all of the other reviews, but I won't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Just call me Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy treats for your doggie friend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the amount of treats you get. The bag was sealed when I got it but the treats were a little hard. My dog loves these and they’re great when you break them into pieces for training or to play with your dog. I will be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only packaged meat treat my dog will eat
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them and they can be easily broken into small pieces for training purposes. They are invaluable to me as the only thing my dog loves more is Velveeta cheese and it's hard to carry around without a great deal of mess. Thanks for adding the other 2 "meat" varieties to the original and offering the larger size on Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: MEWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Soft, fresh, resealable bag
customer_reviews.text: These arrived fresh. I have a tiny dog, we break off pieces to give him. I know they are fresh by how they break. They are soft, great for tiny dogs or senior dogs that have teeth issues. The resealable bag keeps them fresh for months. The 25 ounce bag lasts, for my dog, for about 9 months. My dog loves these. Only treat he does his doggy dance for.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fields

customer_reviews.title: My dogs will do anything for these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these treats. They will literally do ANYTHING to get one of these sticks, they know the sound of the container opening and all run up and sit patiently. Yes, they give them some stinky farts, but they thoroughly enjoy snacking on these, as well as doing tricks to earn them. Will continue to buy them on a monthly basis!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: The added sugar will keep me from buying more.
customer_reviews.text: I used to really love giving my dog these treats. They were her favorite treats and were great for training. However, after taking the time to read the ingredients one day, I saw that there was quite a bit of extra sugar added which is horrible for a dogs teeth and general health. I stopped giving these to her immediately and switched over to Wellness, who doesn’t include any unnecessary sugar. I encourage any owner who is thinking of, or currently feeding their dog this to consider switching to a healthier alternative. Yes, these are cheap and tasty (for the dog), but the dental bills that could come later on because of them won’t be that cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love the tasty snacks
customer_reviews.text: The product is very convenient to dispense when desired. It's not greasy on the hands or clothing. It has an attractive smell and is easy for all age dogs to eat. It comes in a resealable bag to stay fresh and easily storable. The only disadvantage is the MSRP. Unless you can find these on sale they are just too expensive to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: r7

customer_reviews.title: I normally purchase at my local grocery store and the like, but decided to add this to my cart ...
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these. I normally purchase at my local grocery store and the like, but decided to add this to my cart along with another purchase. Was disappointed however as they did not seem fresh. The reason I like these are because of how soft they are and easy for my small pup to chew. I must have received a not so great batch as they were tough and not at all what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Maev

customer_reviews.title: Do your dogs a favor ... with flavor
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how much my dog likes these treats. Her little friends (small dogs owned by my step daughters) crave them also. We have to prepare little take home bags for them after they visit. I'd say these treats are the top favorite of our dog and she knows the bag by sight. For the price we get a lot of "thanks" from our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H. Labowitz

customer_reviews.title: Unhealthy
customer_reviews.text: After our dog gained too much weight our vet said that these were very unhealthy and were killing our dog. He recommended using baby carrots as treats and although I was skeptical carrots are now our pets treat of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it, but because of salt, sugar, and onion
customer_reviews.text: Dog totally loves it. But I think this is dog's version of unhealthy junk. How do I know? I tasted it. Taste a pinch and you'll realize how much salt, sugar, onion this has. All of those are bad for your dog. These are also noted on the packet, though not the proportion. Would have been nice if there was a big warning on the packet. I strongly suggest you minimize this treat for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Arnab Bose

customer_reviews.title: Not the healthiest, but my dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: We normally only buy high quality treats and a lot of times I get them from our local pet store that makes fresh treats there, but my dog loves these things. They are great for training because you can easily break them up into small pieces and they have a strong scent that my dog loves.
customer_reviews.author: M. HieberTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, my furbabies love them!! And the best part is Amazon is the cheapest price for this large bag. It goes a long way with our girls, they are on the small side so we split one in half and share with them. And that's plenty for them, larger dogs would want a whole one I would imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these and have for years
customer_reviews.text: We get a couple bags a month and the dogs are super motivated for these meaty treats. We cut them into 1/4" sections for frequent rewards and it works for large and small dogs alike. They've been getting these treats for several years and seem not to tire of them.
customer_reviews.author: RJF

customer_reviews.title: OUR DOGS LOVE THEM!  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to tear off little pieces or cut them up for handy treats or rewards (e.g. peeing and pooping on walks). Also, great for round rocking Kong pyramid that holds little snacks that fall out a small side hole when the dog slaps it over on its side then it rocks back upright on its own. Our little yorkies love that game and ask me to refill it for them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Solaris Lover

customer_reviews.title: Product is fresh and good buy
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical reading some of the reviews about freshness or making a dog sick. Freshness is not an issue as expiration is October 2020. I was not aware these were the Lean Recipe treats but my dogs aren’t to fussy. The price was excellent so am relieved this is not a faux product...of something changes, I will repost as my dogs are my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Reimer

customer_reviews.title: Puppy/Dog friendly
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these for years now and the price is soo worth the quantity....my dog is a picky eater and very picky when it comes to treats since he was 2months he has been eating only this treat...I used to get them from walmart but past 4yrs I have been getting it from amazon because it's more quantity wise for the same price and its convenient to just get it delivered....
customer_reviews.author: Margi P.

customer_reviews.title: NOT S DOG PERSON
customer_reviews.text: I AM NOT A DOG PERSON BUT MY NEIGHBOR HAS A SMALL DOG WHOSE NAME IS BELLA. I LOVE HER TO DEATH. HER BIRTHDAY IS VALENTINES DAY AND I ALWAYS GET HER HER FAVORITE SNACK. I KNOW IT IS DELICIOUS BECAUSE BELLA DANCES AND SITS RIGHT IN FRONT OF THE CUPBOARD THAT STORES HER SNACK. BELLA SAYS WOOOF WOOOF.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Carty Octave

customer_reviews.title: Lean, soft chew for dogs with teeth loss.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yo Maltese has had a bunch of teeth removed and I switched to this for a softer chew alternative. They are also easy to break into small pieces. This also fits well into my dog’s low fat diet ( due to age and pancreatitis). She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Marina Zinovyev

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: These treats are great as they are soft, and unlike other biscuit treats don't crumble everywhere when my dogs eat them. I always have these in the house. When I let my dog know he is getting one, he goes wild spinning in circles. I am not what is in them, but both my dogs are crazy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Marie Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: My pups love these. The best part is, this is the big bag and at such a great price! When I ordered it, I assumed it was the smaller size bag because of the price but when it arrived, I was pleasantly surprised. I will definitely order these again!
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: Big Bag, Big Soft  Stix, Great!
customer_reviews.text: All 6 little dogs loved these!! I hadn't seen this flavor before. The bag is large and the sticks are long, so I broke them in half. Softest I have ever bought and they loved them, don't know what else to say except try them and I would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: LiL Bit Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: This is the guilty pleasure in our house. I concentrate on treats to aid in restoring her dental health for all treats except this one. She really enjoys the taste and the shape. She's a senior girl and it's easier on her teeth than the crunchy biscuits. I always purchase the LEAN variety and usually break the size to an appropriate length.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Shopsalot

customer_reviews.title: Good price and the dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: Milkbones are the primary treat we give our dogs, but we like to mix it up with the occasional soft treat. These treats are inexpensive and the dogs absolutely love them. Plus, the treats are scored making it easy to take one and break it into several smaller treats for training or just to limit caloric intake. I'll be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Rated 5 star’s
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars Our pups love this product great price. Also man I add the product is very fresh when I receive them. I don’t know if anyone else is like me I like fresh products not something that is set an a warehouse forever. That means a lot to me. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great puppy training tool. I have used this for many years on my puppies. Normally when I purchased this pup-peroni, the size of the pieces were about a quarter inch in length. These were much larger so .I will need to cut each piece into 3 or 4 pieces for my pup.
customer_reviews.author: Sojourneyer

customer_reviews.title: Mitzy Loves Pup-Peroni
customer_reviews.text: My name is Mitzy. I am a one year old Maltese/Shitzu hybrid and I absolutely love Pup-Peroni. I am rather finicky when it comes to rewards for good behavior. I expect the best and this is it. My "Mom and Dad" like to make me happy and this Pup-Perone makes me a happy puppy, willing to do anything, on my own terms, of course. I heard about Pup-Perone from my play friend, Ben, who is a real hunk Bichon. Thanks again, from a very happy puppy. I am also pretty good at writing reviews because I have small paws (hands) that can use the keyboard. And, the cat can't even reach the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: California Tennis Player

customer_reviews.title: Always fresh!
customer_reviews.text: This product has consistently arrived well packaged with all the sticks in tact. The treats are always fresh and they are not overly smelly as some of these types of snacks are. My dogs love them and they do not seem to upset any tummies!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casper's favorite
customer_reviews.text: My Westie just loves these treats looks forward to getting them as a reward. They are soft and easy for him to chew since he has lost a few teeth. They stay soft after opening which is a plus. Would recommend this to any dog lover.
customer_reviews.author: Marian742

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepard love these and the are always fresh and the price is great for what you get! This price would be double in some of the store and sometimes you don’t even get as much!! Never had a bad experience and order at least 5x!
customer_reviews.author: EKG

customer_reviews.title: Formula changed !?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this formula has changed but this was the 1st time I’ve purchased these through amazon. Every time I’ve given my dog a piece she’s thrown it up!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: great for partially toothless senior dogs
customer_reviews.text: We use these are treats and sometimes break one up and scatter the pieces around for the pups to find. One is partially edentulous and is able to manage small pieces. The one with teeth gets bigger pieces. great treat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I have never ate one myself but my greyhounds love them. I like that it is low in fat. Most dogs do not need high fat but they love the treat. I also love the fact that it does not leave crumbs on the floor or the dogs beds.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: A bit dry in the package
customer_reviews.text: These must have been old. I bought a small pack from the store and my pup loved them. They were also very moist. These came fairly dry, and dry out very quickly outside the package. Probably wont buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The perfect treat.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect treat for a small dog with small teeth. My big dogs would like them , too, but they are reserved for the chihuahua. The quality is good, the price is right and it’s nice to always be able to trust amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs know the sound of the bag,and it's treat time! So far its the only dog snack they like. The sticks can be irregular in size width wise. My only concern is the occasional batch has a stronger garlic smell.
customer_reviews.author: L.P.

customer_reviews.title: Just a bad bag???
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my dogs really didn’t like this bag of Pup-Peroni treats. These are their favorites but they just sniffed these and didn’t really want them. Eventually they ate them but they certainly weren’t happy about it. I didn’t even think to check for an expiration date. Silly me!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Lots of appeal
customer_reviews.text: Any dog (I've been a professional trainer for over 50 yrs.) absolutely loves it. It breaks up neatly and is firm enough not to crumble. However, it is a form of junk food, compared to the many "healthy" snacks available. Everything in moderation.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte L. Bloch

customer_reviews.title: dried up
customer_reviews.text: Our dog absolutely loves these treats. This company has a good price on them, but the date of expiration on the bag we received was for Jan. 2020. Sounds okay. Unfortunately the product inside was dried up and tough. We'll be getting these locally from now on even though they cost a little more.
customer_reviews.author: advidreader

customer_reviews.title: Select-a-size treats!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor! My dogs always enjoy them! I especially like these because you can give it to them all at once for a treat or I can tear them into smaller pieces when working on training/tricks with my pups.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley S.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone has given these to their dog already, right?
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the price I got on these Pup-Peroni dog treats. My dogs love them. They're huge, so I break them into 4-5 pieces and give them as bedtime snacks - or break one into pieces further to give a "snack" as I'm leaving the the house. They are a hit, and they're inexpensive - which I love!
customer_reviews.author: Jagroo

customer_reviews.title: Meat by Products
customer_reviews.text: I always read labels to be sure no meat by products. This now has by products in it. By products can mean road kill, euthanasia animals who have killer meds on board. These are responsible for making our pets sick. I won’t buy again unless they change ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these. I also love that i can have them delivered every two weeks without actually ordering. That is the way to go, so i do not forget! I would have some unhappy doggies. Thank you for this option .
customer_reviews.author: wendy Henry

customer_reviews.title: Freshness not consistent.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if you see a deal that is MUCH better than what you can get at the store - because it might be old stock. Happened to me once and the treats were dryer (and thinner) than normal. Dogs still enjoyed them though, so I kept them.
customer_reviews.author: E. DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy on your dog's teeth
customer_reviews.text: When I give my dog a choice and put this Pup-peroni treat out with any other treat, my dog always chooses this one. My mid-size dog loves these, but devours them quickly. She lays down to eat them and is done within a minute. This is great for a quick snack to reward your dog for something, but is not meant to occupy them like a Rawhide. It's relatively soft and easy on her teeth.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these treats
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Pup Peroni's since I have had dogs. They are a great treat and can be used for training if need be. They love them. I myself have not tried them so cannot vouch for the "flavor".
customer_reviews.author: R. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Best treat for my dogs. As soon as they hear a bag , they want a pupperoni
customer_reviews.text: I have one dog that sleeps with the bag. She takes it everywhere she goes in the house. It weights as much as she does.She guards the bags day and night,grawls at the other dogs,even if they walk by.
customer_reviews.author: Tim West

customer_reviews.title: Favorite treat for our “good boy”
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this treat so I defer to his opinion in granting stars for the rating ;) As he loves them so much, that I typically break one into fourths and dole the quarters out to him throughout the day. He gives them four paws up!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Adams

customer_reviews.title: My dogs fave!
customer_reviews.text: This is my dogs favorite treat! She likes chicken jerky and marrow bones but she loves her puppy roni (as she likes us to call it haha) Amazon offers a great price and the product is always fresh.
customer_reviews.author: breezy

customer_reviews.title: My dog will do back flips for these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog luvs these and it's been my 'go-to cookie' for him since he's been a pup, 11 yrs ago. He's a JRT, and very food motivated. This treat isn't overly processed, and doesn't have that artificial smoke smell that I find in other treats. Amazon has these large bags at the best price I've found so far.
customer_reviews.author: BasiaD

customer_reviews.title: Too Good
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes nuts for these. The first time I gave her one she inhaled the whole piece without even chewing it. I gave her another to see it for real and she did the same thing. I thought maybe she dropped it or something the first time, then I thought maybe I was hallucinating! So, from that day on, I have to break them up into a few pieces and give her one piece at a time and then when I am ready to close up the bag and put it away she practically attacks me for more. Maybe when she learns how to chew I will give her a little more.
customer_reviews.author: J. MarinoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: They love them!
customer_reviews.text: Not the healthiest snack but both my dogs love them. I give them pieces every now and then as a special treat. It's not expensive and lasts a long time. I'm asked to rate the scent. They love it; me not so much; therefore only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Dog "candy"
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. I have to keep them on hand all the time or else I have a revolt on my hands. They smell like pepperoni. I don't mind smelling them because most dog food and treats just make me sick. Makes me feel sorry for them having to eat that stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Tawanna

customer_reviews.title: These things are always a hit in my house. ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are always a hit in my house. My dog goes from a crazy wild critter to a well mannered calm dog when he sees the bag. He brings out every trick he knows to get a stick. They are gone in about 5 seconds so I always try to buy the big bag and stick to giving him only 1 or 2 at a time. He loves all of the flavors except the chicken.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Difference in vendors, dIfference in quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves Pup-eroni. We purchase the Lean Beef 99% of the time. There is a big difference between the ones from Amazon and the ones from Target. Neither was past-dated. Amazon's are very dry, while the ones from Target are more moist. The dry ones do not digest as well for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetsong

customer_reviews.title: The Prime Rib Flavor Has a Strong Smell. Will purchase other varieties..It must be really great and he would rate it excellent
customer_reviews.text: The Prime Rib flavor has a very strong smell compared to all other varieties I have purchased. Gave the others 5 stars. My fur kid loves his Pup-Peroni and will pretend to need to go out then run to his treat jar. It's difficult not to reward his little con act, but he usually wins, unless it's a .midnight snack. It must be really great and he would rate it excellent. These are thicker than those I usually purchase and it's great because I can break them up.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Every dog, I've ever met, love these...
customer_reviews.text: ...every dog, I've ever met, love these... Just be warned, the Vet warns against allowing, too many.... Like giving dogs candy, per se, added calories... We try to limit our baby, to one a day..
customer_reviews.author: cheryl thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's dog loves these. However, these were not fresh. Purchased four bags total. All four were dry and hard. Back to buying them from Sam's. There I can squeeze the contents of the bag and confirm that they are soft and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My parent’s pup loves these! He is very picky with snacks but he eats these right up. Same product that you can get in stores but so much more for the price. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Megan P.

customer_reviews.title: Terra approved. Except 4th shipment
customer_reviews.text: Terra is very picky and won't take them if they are not soft. Every package has been soft and smells good. This last package was very hard. I'm not sure I want to get any more.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Dog getting sick?
customer_reviews.text: We've bought these in the past but for some reason this time they are making our cocker spaniel sick.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I love these! I meant my dog does.
customer_reviews.text: Theses are always fresh and soft. They don’t smell like other brands that I use for training my dog. I give half a stick to my dog when he pees and a full one when he poops!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bui

customer_reviews.title: My "good boys" go nuts for these things!
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs get excited for treats, almost any treats, but when they see me grab the bag of pup-peroni they literally start jumping up and down and spinning in circles! They LOVE these things!
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Pup-Peroni Dog Snacks
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves them more than any other snack. She will take her pills faster if they are stuck in a piece of Pup-Peroni than any other way. She stands by the cupboard where i keep them and waits impatiently foe her treat.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Great dog treat with lower fat!
customer_reviews.text: My Dachshunds love these treats! And they smell so good too. I like the fact that they are 40% reduced fat. These treats are especially nice to give my older dogs. They are missing quite a few teeth so eating Puperoni helps with their gums.
customer_reviews.author: Shorton25

customer_reviews.title: Nice treat
customer_reviews.text: Price was great for amount. Break one in 1/2 still good size for my 2 big dogs. Price low enough i give a bag periodically to the drive-ins in town that hand out treats. Everyone knows my 2 so they get extras, gotta give back!
customer_reviews.author: squishy

customer_reviews.title: My dog is obsessed with these!!
customer_reviews.text: Every day my dog runs to the refrigerator when I wake up. He loves these treats. I have spent hundreds of $$$$ on dog treats, this is the only one he likes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: my puppy loves it
customer_reviews.text: there are many treats out there but this one is the one my little girl loves. She wakes up each day to them and refuses to eat any other... must taste good!
customer_reviews.author: T. Darder

customer_reviews.title: Make your dog happy
customer_reviews.text: Ours dogs and their friends are right at my feet if I open my pantry door. They love this treat. It’s soft so easy to break in pieces for a learning treat.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie D.

customer_reviews.title: Little fakers love these !!
customer_reviews.text: Little furry friends really enjoy these...cut them into one inch size pieces and give them one each time they come inside after they potty as a training incentive to come right back after they do their business. Soooo sometimes they beg to go outside...run out and turn right around and quickly run back in ...faking me out just to get their treat! Needless to say...they love these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great treat, good price
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these. soft and tasty and easy to break into small bits for training rewards. Just remember to keep the package sealed. Once they dry out they get pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: Grainne Hed

customer_reviews.title: My 3 small dogs Love their Pup-Peroni Dog Snacks
customer_reviews.text: My 3 fur babies LOVE these. The smallest a senior tiny Pom, who has had several teeth removed enjoys this treat as it is easy to chew and swallow. Of course, I cut off the tiniest piece for her.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Worrel

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do well with my dog’s tummies
customer_reviews.text: Won’t be buying these again. My dogs ate them happily but threw them up three times in two days. Not sure why they suddenly can’t tolerate this treat.
customer_reviews.author: Cleaning Machine

customer_reviews.title: Holly's Treats - #4
customer_reviews.text: We buy all dog treat for our Holly-Dolly Gurlfriend at Amazon. She is a big gal - 70+ pounds - and likes some treats every day. Why not, she's our pet! She is a rescue dog- her "Mom" decided to leave her husband, who was a long haul trucker and on the road at the time. She took Holly and her 9 pups to s shelter and dumped then. It was kismet - we were looking for another Dog, so we went to theshelter. Allof her pups had been adopted, but not Holly, their Mom, until we came along. She is th equeen of our house!!
customer_reviews.author: Bombastus64

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for bigger dogs
customer_reviews.text: Maybe not so suitable for small sized dogs, my dog always choked on it. My dog is 13lbs dachshund, it’s little hard for her to chew, I need to break them into micro pieces.
customer_reviews.author: J Wen

product_meta.title: Pup-Peroni Dog Snacks
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Bacon| Size:10-OunceMade with real savory bacon, Pup-Peroni Original Bacon Flavor dog snacks get a paws-up from Pups nationwide. Whether you're out for a hike or enjoying a spur-of-the-moment road trip with your best friend, these tasty dog snacks will add extra flavor to your adventure! Dogs Just Know.
feature_bullets: Contains One 10 Ounce Pouch Of Original Bacon Flavor Dog Treats
A Mouthwatering Aroma That Dogs Just Can'T Resist
Tasty, Tender Treats With A Flavor They'Ll Love
Package Is The Perfect Size For Carrying On Walks
Soft Jerky Is Easy To Break Into Smaller Pieces

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
